name: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol. 18: Kanji Quiz: Kanji Kentei ni Challenge
overview: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol.18 - Kanji Quiz - Kanji Keitei ni Challenge is the 18th game (and the latest one) in the practical 1500 series released for the Playstation One console by D3 Publisher. This time the game let the user to try to answer more than 20000 questions that will challenge his kanji skills, that way the user will try to learn the chinese language.
